text.last_approved_text: The civil war has been put down; the dissidents have been punished and your leadership proved to be the rightful one. Your faction is whole again, and will be stronger for it.

event_feed_strings.text: The civil war has been put down; the dissidents have been punished and your leadership proved to be the rightful one. Your faction is whole again, and will be stronger for it.

text.last_approved_text: This army has joined the rebels in a civil war against you. Their betrayal will not be forgotten.

event_feed_strings.text: This army has joined the rebels in a civil war against you. Their betrayal will not be forgotten.

text.last_approved_text: This commandery has become part of a civil war against you. This betrayal will not be forgotten.

event_feed_strings.text: This commandery has become part of a civil war against you. This betrayal will not be forgotten.

text.last_approved_text: This faction is no more, leaving one less warrior on the battlefield of history. They may be remembered, or their very name may be consigned to oblivion.

event_feed_strings.text: This faction is no more, leaving one less warrior on the battlefield of history. They may be remembered, or their very name may be consigned to oblivion.

text.last_approved_text: This faction is no more, leaving one less contender for the throne. History may remember them or their very name may be consigned to oblivion.

event_feed_strings.text: This faction is no more, leaving one less contender for the throne. History may remember them or their very name may be consigned to oblivion.

text.last_approved_text: The fire of this rebellion has been extinguished, for now. Although the insurgents have laid down their arms and returned home, we must be ever-vigilant of their potential return.

event_feed_strings.text: The fire of this rebellion has been extinguished, for now. Although the insurgents have laid down their arms and returned home, we must be ever-vigilant of their potential return.

text.last_approved_text: A new faction has been born among the chaos that shrouds the land. Ally or foe, their very presence adds to the uncertainty that threatens Chinas unification.

event_feed_strings.text: A new faction has been born among the chaos that shrouds the land. Ally or foe, their very presence adds to the uncertainty that threatens Chinas unification.

text.last_approved_text: We have made diplomatic contact with these factions. Will they prove honourable friends or formidable foes?

event_feed_strings.text: We have made diplomatic contact with these factions. Will they prove honourable friends or formidable foes?

text.last_approved_text: Having lost your last emperor seat, you have lost the Will of Heaven and are no longer fit to call yourself emperor.

event_feed_strings.text: Having lost your last emperor seat, you have lost the Will of Heaven and are no longer fit to call yourself emperor.

text.last_approved_text: This warlord has lost their imperial palace, and rallies against the perception that they are no longer emperor, claiming the other claimants are imposters.

event_feed_strings.text: This warlord has lost their imperial palace, and rallies against the perception that they are no longer emperor, claiming the other claimants are imposters.

text.last_approved_text: New blood comes to lead another faction, carrying on their hopes, dreams and ideas.

event_feed_strings.text: New blood comes to lead another faction, carrying on their hopes, dreams and ideas.

text.last_approved_text: The following settlements are consuming more food that they are capable of producing. People are starving and tensions are high!

event_feed_strings.text: The following settlements are consuming more food that they are capable of producing. People are starving and tensions are high!

text.last_approved_text: Food shortages are causing suffering in the following settlements. Measures must be taken before the people there rise up against us in desperation.

event_feed_strings.text: Food shortages are causing suffering in the following settlements. Measures must be taken before the people there rise up against us in desperation.

text.last_approved_text: A lean period for produce has thankfully come to an end; the following settlements' yield of crops are once again plentiful enough to feed all.

event_feed_strings.text: A lean period for produce has thankfully come to an end; the following settlements' yield of crops are once again plentiful enough to feed all.

text.last_approved_text: Circumstances have led these two to become firm acquaintances. Time will tell if their relationship flourishes into friendship or descends into rivalry.

event_feed_strings.text: Circumstances have led these two to become firm acquaintances. Time will tell if their relationship flourishes into friendship or descends into rivalry.

text.last_approved_text: Their lives clearly leading them along separate paths, the relationship between these two has dissipated to the point of irrelevance.

event_feed_strings.text: Their lives clearly leading them along separate paths, the relationship between these two has dissipated to the point of irrelevance.

text.last_approved_text: The following people have become like siblings; in these uncertain times, such bonds of close friendship must be cherished.

event_feed_strings.text: The following people have become like siblings; in these uncertain times, such bonds of close friendship must be cherished.

text.last_approved_text: Time can strain bonds as surely as it can reinforce them, and the sworn kinship these two people once shared is now no more than a memory.

event_feed_strings.text: Time can strain bonds as surely as it can reinforce them, and the sworn kinship these two people once shared is now no more than a memory.

text.last_approved_text: The following people have become friends; friendship is a valuable thing in these uncertain times, and must be clasped tightly.

event_feed_strings.text: The following people have become friends; friendship is a valuable thing in these uncertain times, and must be clasped tightly.

text.last_approved_text: Time can strain bonds as surely as it can reinforce them, and the friendship these two people once shared is now no more than a memory.

event_feed_strings.text: Time can strain bonds as surely as it can reinforce them, and the friendship these two people once shared is now no more than a memory.

text.last_approved_text: Fate has pitched these two people in extreme opposition; once rivals, their increasing mutual hatred has made them sworn nemeses.

event_feed_strings.text: Fate has pitched these two people in extreme opposition; once rivals, their increasing mutual hatred has made them sworn nemeses.

text.last_approved_text: The hatred driving these two people has come to an end. Perhaps reason has finally prevailed, or the conflict has exhausted one, causing them to cede to the other? \n\n Regardless, each consider the contentious matter that caused the animosity closed.

event_feed_strings.text: The hatred driving these two people has come to an end. Perhaps reason has finally prevailed, or the conflict has exhausted one, causing them to cede to the other? \n\n Regardless, each consider the contentious matter that caused the animosity closed.

text.last_approved_text: Fate has pitched these two people in opposition; rather than yield to one another or go their separate ways, they have enthusiastically embraced the rivalry as a competition to be won.

event_feed_strings.text: Fate has pitched these two people in opposition; rather than yield to one another or go their separate ways, they have enthusiastically embraced the rivalry as a competition to be won.

text.last_approved_text: The rivalry these two people felt has come to an end. Perhaps reason has finally prevailed?

event_feed_strings.text: The rivalry these two people felt has come to an end. Perhaps reason has finally prevailed?

text.last_approved_text: Glorious day! Your heir has come of age and can now rule directly. May their wisdom guide us towards a reunified China.

event_feed_strings.text: Glorious day! Your heir has come of age and can now rule directly. May their wisdom guide us towards a reunified China.

text.last_approved_text: This faction's heir has come of age and can now rule directly. Time will tell if their leadership will pose a threat to our ambitions.

event_feed_strings.text: This faction's heir has come of age and can now rule directly. Time will tell if their leadership will pose a threat to our ambitions.

text.last_approved_text: The rightful line has been restored.

event_feed_strings.text: The rightful line has been restored.

text.last_approved_text: While it is important to strengthen bonds without through marriage, those within are equally vital. \n\n A wall is only as strong as its weakest brick, and companionship and good relations are the foundation of a strong faction.

event_feed_strings.text: While it is important to strengthen bonds without through marriage, those within are equally vital. \n\n A wall is only as strong as its weakest brick, and companionship and good relations are the foundation of a strong faction.

event_feed_strings.text: Enemy ambush discovered!

event_feed_strings.text: Our ambush has been discovered!

text.last_approved_text: The following people have shown an aptitude for the vagaries of politics, and have been appointed ministerial posts.

event_feed_strings.text: The following people have shown an aptitude for the vagaries of politics, and have been appointed ministerial posts.

text.last_approved_text: A rare combination of character, expertise and honour mark these people fit for leading warriors into battle.

event_feed_strings.text: A rare combination of character, expertise and honour mark these people fit for leading warriors into battle.

event_feed_strings.text: The following people have been promoted to the post of administrator.

text.last_approved_text: This person has been executed. A confirmed enemy of our faction, and therefore justice, they have been judged as deserving of the ultimate punishment. \n\n Let this act as a warning to those who oppose us.

event_feed_strings.text: This person has been executed. A confirmed enemy of our faction, and therefore justice, they have been judged as deserving of the ultimate punishment. \n\n Let this act as a warning to those who oppose us.

text.last_approved_text: This person has been executed. Evidence has been found of misconduct, and their loyalty towards our faction has been found wanting. \n\n Let this act as a warning to all traitors.

event_feed_strings.text: This person has been executed. Evidence has been found of misconduct, and their loyalty towards our faction has been found wanting. \n\n Let this act as a warning to all traitors.

text.last_approved_text: This former enemy has been pardoned and now acts as an agent for our faction. \n\n Certain attributes of their character may prove useful to us, and it has been deemed prudent to forgive past offences and guide them towards righteousness.

event_feed_strings.text: This former enemy has been pardoned and now acts as an agent for our faction. \n\n Certain attributes of their character may prove useful to us, and it has been deemed prudent to forgive past offences and guide them towards righteousness.

text.last_approved_text: This person has been released from their bonds and hired to once again in the service of our faction. \n\n It has been decided that they will atone for past crimes by performing certain duties agreeable to their unique skills.

event_feed_strings.text: This person has been released from their bonds and hired to once again in the service of our faction. \n\n It has been decided that they will atone for past crimes by performing certain duties agreeable to their unique skills.

text.last_approved_text: This enemy has been released from captivity. \n\n There is no profit in continuing their incarceration, and a demonstration of mercy may even open discourse between their faction and ours.

event_feed_strings.text: This enemy has been released from captivity. \n\n There is no profit in continuing their incarceration, and a demonstration of mercy may even open discourse between their faction and ours.

text.last_approved_text: This person has atoned for their crimes and has been released from captivity. \n\n Now that they have some understanding of the consequences, perhaps they will embrace justice, rather than disobedience.

event_feed_strings.text: This person has atoned for their crimes and has been released from captivity. \n\n Now that they have some understanding of the consequences, perhaps they will embrace justice, rather than disobedience.

text.last_approved_text: There are none with the power and the wisdom to bring unity back to this chaotic land but you. \n\n By claiming the title of duke, you have moved one step closer to establishing order once more; forge on!

event_feed_strings.text: There are none with the power and the wisdom to bring unity back to this chaotic land but you. \n\n By claiming the title of duke, you have moved one step closer to establishing order once more; forge on!

text.last_approved_text: Just as the tide eventually wears down the cliffs, so too has your patience and persistence overwhelmed your opposition. \n\n Order is almost restored to China, and with you as king, the arrival of that order can only be hastened.

event_feed_strings.text: Just as the tide eventually wears down the cliffs, so too has your patience and persistence overwhelmed your opposition. \n\n Order is almost restored to China, and with you as king, the arrival of that order can only be hastened.

text.last_approved_text: Your power continues to rise, and great scores of the people swear fealty to you. \n\n Yet you must continue on this path; the scourge of chaos lingers still, and it must all be put right once more.

event_feed_strings.text: Your power continues to rise, and great scores of the people swear fealty to you. \n\n Yet you must continue on this path; the scourge of chaos lingers still, and it must all be put right once more.

text.last_approved_text: Oppression and war lie heavy upon the land. It falls to you to reverse these dark tidings. Your power grows, but will need to grow more if your ambitions are to be realised!

event_feed_strings.text: Oppression and war lie heavy upon the land. It falls to you to reverse these dark tidings. Your power grows, but will need to grow more if your ambitions are to be realised!

text.last_approved_text: As your position rises, you must use your newfound power as grand master to dominate! Only through power will China know unity and peace. \n\n Of course, those who insist on remaining in ignorance must be dealt with.

event_feed_strings.text: As your position rises, you must use your newfound power as grand master to dominate! Only through power will China know unity and peace. \n\n Of course, those who insist on remaining in ignorance must be dealt with.

text.last_approved_text: You did not seek this burden, but by claiming the throne of the emperor, you have done what previous dynasties could not. \n\n Order is restored under your iron rule - let none challenge it! Heaven has chosen you!

event_feed_strings.text: You did not seek this burden, but by claiming the throne of the emperor, you have done what previous dynasties could not. \n\n Order is restored under your iron rule - let none challenge it! Heaven has chosen you!

text.last_approved_text: By your continued success, China is brought to ever-greater stability! \n\n By claiming the title of king, as is your right, you have tightened your resolve against the insurgents that challenge the country's peace.

event_feed_strings.text: By your continued success, China is brought to ever-greater stability! \n\n By claiming the title of king, as is your right, you have tightened your resolve against the insurgents that challenge the country's peace.

text.last_approved_text: Let the cry of your ancestors drive your victories ever onward! You have seized the title of duke with a righteous determination, and now face down any who would oppose you with equal vigour!

event_feed_strings.text: Let the cry of your ancestors drive your victories ever onward! You have seized the title of duke with a righteous determination, and now face down any who would oppose you with equal vigour!

text.last_approved_text: From the borders of imperial territory to the very heart of the land, you have risen from humble beginnings. As king, you may feel unchallenged, but the wind must ever blow back the encroaching ocean. \n\n Be vigilant!

event_feed_strings.text: From the borders of imperial territory to the very heart of the land, you have risen from humble beginnings. As king, you may feel unchallenged, but the wind must ever blow back the encroaching ocean. \n\n Be vigilant!

text.last_approved_text: The roar of war drives you to seize more victories and titles! \n\n As marquis, you are now poised to strike further against the enemies of China, securing greater power for yourself in the process.

event_feed_strings.text: The roar of war drives you to seize more victories and titles! \n\n As marquis, you are now poised to strike further against the enemies of China, securing greater power for yourself in the process.

text.last_approved_text: They say a great blade is only born once it slakes its thirst for blood. You too have found your purpose in the destruction of your enemies. \n\n As second marquis, you may continue to attack China's foes!

event_feed_strings.text: They say a great blade is only born once it slakes its thirst for blood. You too have found your purpose in the destruction of your enemies. \n\n As second marquis, you may continue to attack China's foes!

text.last_approved_text: As your position rises, you may use your newfound power as duke to educate! Only through knowledge will China know unity and peace. \n\n Of course, those who insist on remaining in ignorance must be dealt with.

event_feed_strings.text: As your position rises, you may use your newfound power as duke to educate! Only through knowledge will China know unity and peace. \n\n Of course, those who insist on remaining in ignorance must be dealt with.

text.last_approved_text: Your diligent effort and your integrity have rewarded you; through the honesty and resolve of your legacy, you have risen to become king. \n\n China is better for your efforts, but know you cannot rest yet

event_feed_strings.text: Your diligent effort and your integrity have rewarded you; through the honesty and resolve of your legacy, you have risen to become king. \n\n China is better for your efforts, but know you cannot rest yet

text.last_approved_text: Greetings, marquis! Your position and influence has grown by your actions, and now you should use this to better inform and illuminate the people of China, to banish the darkness and bring lasting peace.

event_feed_strings.text: Greetings, marquis! Your position and influence has grown by your actions, and now you should use this to better inform and illuminate the people of China, to banish the darkness and bring lasting peace.

text.last_approved_text: You are beginning to rise above the noise and chaos of infighting, establishing yourself as second marquis. You accrue power, that you might put it to use benefiting China.

event_feed_strings.text: You are beginning to rise above the noise and chaos of infighting, establishing yourself as second marquis. You accrue power, that you might put it to use benefiting China.

text.last_approved_text: You have vowed to defend the people, and through your virtuous actions you have done so. \n\n By claiming the title of duke, you have declared to all others that your claim is strong; continue the fight!

event_feed_strings.text: You have vowed to defend the people, and through your virtuous actions you have done so. \n\n By claiming the title of duke, you have declared to all others that your claim is strong; continue the fight!

text.last_approved_text: The people have flocked to your banner, and through their power you have claimed the title of king. There are very few who can oppose your might now; you have the undying support of the people!

event_feed_strings.text: The people have flocked to your banner, and through their power you have claimed the title of king. There are very few who can oppose your might now; you have the undying support of the people!

text.last_approved_text: There are many obstacles between here and ultimate peace in China, yet you must strive on. By establishing yourself as marquis, you have taken another step along this arduous, but righteous path.

event_feed_strings.text: There are many obstacles between here and ultimate peace in China, yet you must strive on. By establishing yourself as marquis, you have taken another step along this arduous, but righteous path.

text.last_approved_text: The road is still long, but the people have placed their trust in you. Continue on this path; fight for them, defend them, and you will be surely led to victory.

event_feed_strings.text: The road is still long, but the people have placed their trust in you. Continue on this path; fight for them, defend them, and you will be surely led to victory.

text.last_approved_text: Harmony is the correct placement of all things. China has long been absent this harmony, but by taking the title of duke, you are well on your way to restoring it. \n\n Your power grows, and peace is within reach!

event_feed_strings.text: Harmony is the correct placement of all things. China has long been absent this harmony, but by taking the title of duke, you are well on your way to restoring it. \n\n Your power grows, and peace is within reach!

text.last_approved_text: You have claimed the title of king, and in doing so ensured the stability of your dynasty. \n\n Whilst others continue to fight and squabble, you can and should bring them in line. Your legacy depends on it!

event_feed_strings.text: You have claimed the title of king, and in doing so ensured the stability of your dynasty. \n\n Whilst others continue to fight and squabble, you can and should bring them in line. Your legacy depends on it!

text.last_approved_text: Balance in China continues to elude us all, yet you are striving back towards equilibrium. The future of the Han rests on your actions, marquis - you can save their legacy!

event_feed_strings.text: Balance in China continues to elude us all, yet you are striving back towards equilibrium. The future of the Han rests on your actions, marquis - you can save their legacy!

text.last_approved_text: The harmony of China is disturbed, and you have stepped forth to restore it. As second marquis, you can help to forge a path back to stability for the Han.

event_feed_strings.text: The harmony of China is disturbed, and you have stepped forth to restore it. As second marquis, you can help to forge a path back to stability for the Han.

text.last_approved_text: Your arrows have flown, carrying your messages of strength across the battlefield. You are enshrined as duke now, increasingly well-positioned to continue pushing your campaigns of unity across China.

event_feed_strings.text: Your arrows have flown, carrying your messages of strength across the battlefield. You are enshrined as duke now, increasingly well-positioned to continue pushing your campaigns of unity across China.

text.last_approved_text: Your enemies know you as ruthless, and your people know you as benevolent. Yet all now know you as king. \n\n Consolidate your strength, then look to those few who still fight against you, and against China.

event_feed_strings.text: Your enemies know you as ruthless, and your people know you as benevolent. Yet all now know you as king. \n\n Consolidate your strength, then look to those few who still fight against you, and against China.

text.last_approved_text:
The empire survives so long as there are those left to fight in its name. 

 By claiming the title of marquis, you have heralded the Han's defence with every cavalry charge and volley of arrow fire. 

 Continue the fight!

event_feed_strings.text:
The empire survives so long as there are those left to fight in its name. 

 By claiming the title of marquis, you have heralded the Han's defence with every cavalry charge and volley of arrow fire. 

 Continue the fight!

text.last_approved_text: You are one of the few left who will fight for the Han. \n\n As you ascend the hierarchy, second marquis, you must keep the needs of the emperor, and the empire, in your mind at all times.

event_feed_strings.text: You are one of the few left who will fight for the Han. \n\n As you ascend the hierarchy, second marquis, you must keep the needs of the emperor, and the empire, in your mind at all times.

text.last_approved_text: Though some may call your deeds impetuous, there are few who can deny that your tenacity has born fruit. By claiming the title of duke, you have demonstrated to China that you are capable of the leadership that this country sorely needs. \n\n Forge on!

event_feed_strings.text: Though some may call your deeds impetuous, there are few who can deny that your tenacity has born fruit. By claiming the title of duke, you have demonstrated to China that you are capable of the leadership that this country sorely needs. \n\n Forge on!

text.last_approved_text: Although the patient snake catches many prey, the tiger who strikes first is often victorious. You are the tiger and you have struck to victory, and proclaimed your kingship. \n\n Few stand against you, and those who do will face your claws!

event_feed_strings.text: Although the patient snake catches many prey, the tiger who strikes first is often victorious. You are the tiger and you have struck to victory, and proclaimed your kingship. \n\n Few stand against you, and those who do will face your claws!

text.last_approved_text: Marquis! You have claimed the title for your continuing efforts to unite the country - bold and decisive action has led to your continued growth. \n\n The power you are accruing must be channelled - focused - into more action!

event_feed_strings.text: Marquis! You have claimed the title for your continuing efforts to unite the country - bold and decisive action has led to your continued growth. \n\n The power you are accruing must be channelled - focused - into more action!

text.last_approved_text: Bold actions have led to bold results - your strength grows, and with your rising power comes the title of second marquis. \n\n Yet the road between here and final victory is long - you must continue leading the charge!

event_feed_strings.text: Bold actions have led to bold results - your strength grows, and with your rising power comes the title of second marquis. \n\n Yet the road between here and final victory is long - you must continue leading the charge!

text.last_approved_text: You have led China to greater unity, and such is your power that you may now reasonably be styled 'duke'. \n\n Yet there is still more to be done - battle must be charged into still, and you my lord must be the leader of that charge.

event_feed_strings.text: You have led China to greater unity, and such is your power that you may now reasonably be styled 'duke'. \n\n Yet there is still more to be done - battle must be charged into still, and you my lord must be the leader of that charge.

text.last_approved_text: The Dragon of Yuan has roared once more, my lord! \n\n Through your power and ability, you have established yourself as king. So much of China owes you loyalty now, rightfully swearing fealty to your leadership.

event_feed_strings.text: The Dragon of Yuan has roared once more, my lord! \n\n Through your power and ability, you have established yourself as king. So much of China owes you loyalty now, rightfully swearing fealty to your leadership.

text.last_approved_text: You have gained further renown for your deeds, and so claiming the title of marquis is only just! From here, you may better bring these disparate people together, forging firm alliances to drive back the darkness!

event_feed_strings.text: You have gained further renown for your deeds, and so claiming the title of marquis is only just! From here, you may better bring these disparate people together, forging firm alliances to drive back the darkness!

text.last_approved_text: The sleeping dragon awakes - you claim accolades and titles as deserving of your prestige. As second marquis, your opportunities multiply; use them to better combat the rising tide of madness in China!

event_feed_strings.text: The sleeping dragon awakes - you claim accolades and titles as deserving of your prestige. As second marquis, your opportunities multiply; use them to better combat the rising tide of madness in China!

text.last_approved_text: Solid foundations make for the strongest fortresses. \n\n As duke, you have claimed a position long deserved. Enemies still oppose you, but from this vantage point you can better tackle their threat.

event_feed_strings.text: Solid foundations make for the strongest fortresses. \n\n As duke, you have claimed a position long deserved. Enemies still oppose you, but from this vantage point you can better tackle their threat.

text.last_approved_text: It was ever your right to claim the title of king, and now it is done. \n\n Do not let the naysayers influence you; they are traitors and would-be despots. You must press your attack against any who would threaten China's stability.

event_feed_strings.text: It was ever your right to claim the title of king, and now it is done. \n\n Do not let the naysayers influence you; they are traitors and would-be despots. You must press your attack against any who would threaten China's stability.

text.last_approved_text: Even the tiger must advance with caution, lest it charge headlong into danger. You have progressed to the rank of marquis with a practiced care; now continue moving forward, but be wary.

event_feed_strings.text: Even the tiger must advance with caution, lest it charge headlong into danger. You have progressed to the rank of marquis with a practiced care; now continue moving forward, but be wary.

text.last_approved_text: You have made the first motions towards a greater purpose - one you are destined for. Being second marquis gives you political purchase; a strong position from which to continue your campaigns.

event_feed_strings.text: You have made the first motions towards a greater purpose - one you are destined for. Being second marquis gives you political purchase; a strong position from which to continue your campaigns.

text.last_approved_text: The wind howls from the mountain with strength untold. You have descended from above, and with your strength claimed the title of duke. This kingdom must be brought to stability - seemingly by your hand. Forge on!

event_feed_strings.text: The wind howls from the mountain with strength untold. You have descended from above, and with your strength claimed the title of duke. This kingdom must be brought to stability - seemingly by your hand. Forge on!

text.last_approved_text: You are king now - you have claimed that title, and none have had the might to oppose you. Whilst there are those that yet grumble, they will soon be dealt with; ride out and subdue this land!

event_feed_strings.text: You are king now - you have claimed that title, and none have had the might to oppose you. Whilst there are those that yet grumble, they will soon be dealt with; ride out and subdue this land!

text.last_approved_text: As marquis, you have been gifted with the power and responsibility to change things - to charge against those that have corrupted and rotted the Han from its core, and bring them to justice!

event_feed_strings.text: As marquis, you have been gifted with the power and responsibility to change things - to charge against those that have corrupted and rotted the Han from its core, and bring them to justice!

text.last_approved_text: Although you have watched and waited, the time to act has come, and you have ably leapt into the fray. Despite disdain for the ways of court, as second marquis you will be better placed to take decisive action!

event_feed_strings.text: Although you have watched and waited, the time to act has come, and you have ably leapt into the fray. Despite disdain for the ways of court, as second marquis you will be better placed to take decisive action!

text.last_approved_text: Whilst there are those who oppose you, there is no bandit in all of China that would dare defy you. \n\n Your position as bandit leader is without question, as is your strength and power on the battlefield. Continue to show the world your might!

event_feed_strings.text: Whilst there are those who oppose you, there is no bandit in all of China that would dare defy you. \n\n Your position as bandit leader is without question, as is your strength and power on the battlefield. Continue to show the world your might!

text.last_approved_text: Let none doubt your brilliance or your power. You have stood atop the bodies of everyone who has opposed you - yet still some remain. \n\n Cut them apart, let none deny you the right you have claimed!

event_feed_strings.text: Let none doubt your brilliance or your power. You have stood atop the bodies of everyone who has opposed you - yet still some remain. \n\n Cut them apart, let none deny you the right you have claimed!

text.last_approved_text: You ride and pillage where you please, and are rightly known as an outlaw for your actions. Let the fear that men have in their hearts for you drive you onwards to ever-greater fame and glory!

event_feed_strings.text: You ride and pillage where you please, and are rightly known as an outlaw for your actions. Let the fear that men have in their hearts for you drive you onwards to ever-greater fame and glory!

text.last_approved_text: You are rising in power, and a trail of destruction is in your wake. \n\n You are called 'vagabond' - you never settle, and your unpredictability and fury are feared. Yet they do not know the depths of your rage - show them!

text.last_approved_text: We have lost absolute control of this commandery, as our opponents have gained a strategic foothold within our territory.

text.last_approved_text: Simmering unrest has erupted into outright fury and revolt. Imagined or real, the people feel they have been wronged and protest through violence. \n\n We must halt this rebellion immediately, lest their dissent poison our other holdings!

event_feed_strings.text: Simmering unrest has erupted into outright fury and revolt. Imagined or real, the people feel they have been wronged and protest through violence. \n\n We must halt this rebellion immediately, lest their dissent poison our other holdings!

text.last_approved_text: Words and promises will no longer quell the unrest in this settlement. Each new assurance only angers the people further; we must act immediately, or suffer rebellion at the hands of the populace!

event_feed_strings.text: Words and promises will no longer quell the unrest in this settlement. Each new assurance only angers the people further; we must act immediately, or suffer rebellion at the hands of the populace!

text.last_approved_text: While a new heir has taken over the faction, they are, as yet, too young to control it. They must rely on the integrity of their court officials and administrators until they come of age.

text.last_approved_text: Fate has pitched these two people in opposition; rather than yield to one another or go their separate ways, they have enthusiastically embraced the rivalry as a competition to be won.

event_feed_strings.text: Fate has pitched these two people in opposition; rather than yield to one another or go their separate ways, they have enthusiastically embraced the rivalry as a competition to be won.

text.last_approved_text: The rivalry these two people felt has come to an end. Perhaps reason has finally prevailed, or the conflict has exhausted one, causing them to cede to the other? \n\n Regardless, each consider the contentious matter that caused the animosity closed.

text.last_approved_text: Our capital has been taken by the enemy! A grave blow indeed, and one that must be rectified as quickly as possible.

text.last_approved_text:
The enemy has seized one of our settlements. 

 Whether taken for its strategic location, resources, or simply to spite us, they have taken what was ours, gaining ground as we lost it. 

 We must now consider if it is worth attempting to take the settlement back, or to accept the loss and abandon it.

event_feed_strings.text:
The enemy has seized one of our settlements. 

 Whether taken for its strategic location, resources, or simply to spite us, they have taken what was ours, gaining ground as we lost it. 

 We must now consider if it is worth attempting to take the settlement back, or to accept the loss and abandon it.

text.last_approved_text: We have liberated this settlement for our cause. Its population will now either accept their new government peacefully, or begin the stirrings of revolt.

event_feed_strings.text: We have liberated this settlement for our cause. Its population will now either accept their new government peacefully, or begin the stirrings of revolt.

text.last_approved_text: Our settlements here are currently under siege; the enemy presses ever closer, and what resistance we can muster will soon crumble. Unless some miracle occurs, we will be forced to surrender.

text.last_approved_text: An enemy spy has been captured attempting to undermine our trade through skullduggery. Thankfully, the impact will be short-lived, and we can rest well knowing that the spy will do no further damage.

text.last_approved_text: One of our spies has successfully belleagured this faction's trade efforts, a matter of directing the worst sort of bandit toward the best, most lucrative of targets.

text.last_approved_text: One of our own spies has been captured after successfully bolstering this faction's garrison. Though the mission was to their advantage, its motives are unknown to its targets, who have deemed it an act of sabotage.

text.last_approved_text: Our spy has bolstered the garrison here. \n\n By acting the part of a braggart, they indiscreetly hinted at hidden perks open only to those serving there, leading to a swell of volunteers eager not to miss out.

text.last_approved_text: To prevent infiltration by enemy agents, this faction employs their own spies, trained to spot and weed out their equivalents. A careful game of cat and mouse ensues, with each trying to lure and catch the other out. \n\n In this instance, the enemy has succeeded, and we have lost a valuable agent.

text.last_approved_text: One of our spies has been discovered and captured. \n\n However, by several ingenious - and until recently, undetectable - means, they had succeeded in spreading exhaustion by regularly interrupting the sleeping patterns of this faction's troops.

text.last_approved_text: One of our spies has been captured as they tried to return to us. \n\n Their mission was successfully completed, but our message to recall them seems to have been intercepted, and they were caught before leaving this faction's boundaries.

text.last_approved_text: If a valued friend and confidant speaks highly of a subject, then it is only natural for you to look favourably upon that subject. \n\n Our relations with this faction have been improved by such counsel, unbeknownst to them that the person recommending us is actually in our employ.

Although their scouting mission was a success, they were unable to secure employment; they may have lacked the desired qualities, or their timing may simply have been unfortunate.\n\nUnless circumstances change, they will soon be ready to receive new orders, but we must be cautious about arousing suspicion should we choose to send them back!

text.last_approved_text: As our spies attempt to infiltrate a faction, they travel the land scouting and building our undercover network.\n\nWe have received their latest reports:

text.last_approved_text: Our spy has been dispatched to another faction. There, they will travel the land, attempting to ingratiate themselves with the nobility whilst simultaneously scouting for us and building our undercover network.\n\nWhether they will make an impression and successfully infiltrate the faction is uncertain, but we will nonetheless benefit from their clandestine efforts.

text.last_approved_text: These factions have declared war against each other. We will monitor this conflict closely, either aiding one side against the other or watching as two barriers to our ambitions remove themselves.

text.last_approved_text: "Once war is declared, he will not waste precious time in waiting for reinforcements, nor will he turn his army back for fresh supplies, but cross the enemy's frontier without delay." - Sun Tzu

text.last_approved_text: This faction is crushed, and with them goes another relic of the old, corrupt ways. Soon, their entire system shall fall, and we shall rise!

event_feed_strings.text: This faction is crushed, and with them goes another relic of the old, corrupt ways. Soon, their entire system shall fall, and we shall rise!

text.last_approved_text: This faction, who should have been our allies, are destroyed. It is no easy thing, when brother fights brother, but their purpose had been corrupted, and so their fate was sealed.

event_feed_strings.text: This faction, who should have been our allies, are destroyed. It is no easy thing, when brother fights brother, but their purpose had been corrupted, and so their fate was sealed.

text.last_approved_text: Just as fog lingers near the ground and mountain peaks provide clear vantage, ignorance blocks vision only the ascended achieve clarity. \n\n The path towards enlightenment beckons as you refine your understanding of yourself and of the Tao.

event_feed_strings.text: Just as fog lingers near the ground and mountain peaks provide clear vantage, ignorance blocks vision only the ascended achieve clarity. \n\n The path towards enlightenment beckons as you refine your understanding of yourself and of the Tao.

text.last_approved_text: If life is to go forth, then death is to return home - this balance is the key to all things. \n\n You have taken your first bold, yet cautious, steps into a world of greater understanding. You must continue on this path, no matter the obstacles.

event_feed_strings.text: If life is to go forth, then death is to return home - this balance is the key to all things. \n\n You have taken your first bold, yet cautious, steps into a world of greater understanding. You must continue on this path, no matter the obstacles.

text.last_approved_text: Just as the soft overcomes the hard, and the flexible overcomes the rigid, you have practiced patience and resolve, and for your efforts you continue to weather the storm. \n\n Hold your ground, then forge on, for destiny is surely waiting beyond!

event_feed_strings.text: Just as the soft overcomes the hard, and the flexible overcomes the rigid, you have practiced patience and resolve, and for your efforts you continue to weather the storm. \n\n Hold your ground, then forge on, for destiny is surely waiting beyond!

text.last_approved_text: The nature of all things is abstract, elusive, unknowable, yet you have dived deep into both the infinite cosmos and yourself, and returned with a harmonious understanding of heaven, earth and all between. \n\n Put this knowledge now to work for the people, for China!

event_feed_strings.text: The nature of all things is abstract, elusive, unknowable, yet you have dived deep into both the infinite cosmos and yourself, and returned with a harmonious understanding of heaven, earth and all between. \n\n Put this knowledge now to work for the people, for China!

text.last_approved_text: Unity produces duality, duality produces trinity, and trinity produces harmony. From harmony comes all things; the knowledge that you must gain to lose, and lose to gain. \n\n You have seen that knowledge, and better understand. Yet there is still much more to do.

event_feed_strings.text: Unity produces duality, duality produces trinity, and trinity produces harmony. From harmony comes all things; the knowledge that you must gain to lose, and lose to gain. \n\n You have seen that knowledge, and better understand. Yet there is still much more to do.

text.last_approved_text: It is clear now that your claim to the imperial throne is indisputable; you have celestial grace and favour, and the people have carried you to the ultimate seat of power - lead now with a humble strength, but an unyielding and enlightened vision.

event_feed_strings.text: It is clear now that your claim to the imperial throne is indisputable; you have celestial grace and favour, and the people have carried you to the ultimate seat of power - lead now with a humble strength, but an unyielding and enlightened vision.

text.last_approved_text: By understanding yourself, you become aware of your own flaws; this is the first step towards changing ones behaviour and nurturing the roots of virtue. As virtue grows, other people will recognise an exemplar and follow naturally. \n\n Eventually, all of China will be united in virtue.

event_feed_strings.text: By understanding yourself, you become aware of your own flaws; this is the first step towards changing ones behaviour and nurturing the roots of virtue. As virtue grows, other people will recognise an exemplar and follow naturally. \n\n Eventually, all of China will be united in virtue.

text.last_approved_text: You have stepped, boldly into a new understanding, yet the infinite potential of what is left to learn, and what could be learned, also unfurls before you.

event_feed_strings.text: You have stepped, boldly into a new understanding, yet the infinite potential of what is left to learn, and what could be learned, also unfurls before you.

text.last_approved_text: The truly strong know the value of silence, and mystery: he who knows does not speak, and he who speaks does not know. \n\n To be silent and be guided by the senses, this is strength - this is brilliance. Foster this mystery!

event_feed_strings.text: The truly strong know the value of silence, and mystery: he who knows does not speak, and he who speaks does not know. \n\n To be silent and be guided by the senses, this is strength - this is brilliance. Foster this mystery!

text.last_approved_text: You have seen the nature of things; the great span of the cosmos laid out before you, and you have seen also your place within this great mystery. \n\n You are empowered now, by this knowledge, to stride forth and claim destiny.

event_feed_strings.text: You have seen the nature of things; the great span of the cosmos laid out before you, and you have seen also your place within this great mystery. \n\n You are empowered now, by this knowledge, to stride forth and claim destiny.

text.last_approved_text: The Tao gives life to all - virtue feeds, materiality shapes and energy completes. To honour the Tao is to honour all things, to nurture all things and create all things. \n\n Continue to refine your understanding of the Tao, and so yourself.

event_feed_strings.text: The Tao gives life to all - virtue feeds, materiality shapes and energy completes. To honour the Tao is to honour all things, to nurture all things and create all things. \n\n Continue to refine your understanding of the Tao, and so yourself.

text.last_approved_text: As heaven's favour fell from the Han, so now it has been bequeathed to you. \n\n Be a paragon of virtue, purity and simplicity for the people, and China will surely be led into a truly enlightened age.

event_feed_strings.text: As heaven's favour fell from the Han, so now it has been bequeathed to you. \n\n Be a paragon of virtue, purity and simplicity for the people, and China will surely be led into a truly enlightened age.

text.last_approved_text: If man always believes himself just, then evil deeds are only possible whilst in a state of ignorance. \n\n When the people reach a state of great understanding, virtuous behaviour will thus follow naturally, and China can finally achieve harmony in accordance with the will of heaven.

event_feed_strings.text: If man always believes himself just, then evil deeds are only possible whilst in a state of ignorance. \n\n When the people reach a state of great understanding, virtuous behaviour will thus follow naturally, and China can finally achieve harmony in accordance with the will of heaven.

text.last_approved_text: To know harmony is to know the eternal, and to know the eternal is to know enlightenment. \n\n This is the path you have chosen to walk - the knowledge that from the moment we live, we begin to die. Let this harmony guide you onwards!

event_feed_strings.text: To know harmony is to know the eternal, and to know the eternal is to know enlightenment. \n\n This is the path you have chosen to walk - the knowledge that from the moment we live, we begin to die. Let this harmony guide you onwards!

text.last_approved_text: If an empire is ruled by righteousness, and an army by strategy, then the people surely require freedom to flourish? \n\n The Tao dictates that great peace will come through great freedom to free the people is to empower them, and yourself also.

event_feed_strings.text: If an empire is ruled by righteousness, and an army by strategy, then the people surely require freedom to flourish? \n\n The Tao dictates that great peace will come through great freedom to free the people is to empower them, and yourself also.

text.last_approved_text: The man who practices the Tao shows himself to be virtuous; the empire that practices the Tao shows virtue is the universe. \n\n ou must let your virtue become a model for others, that they may aspire to better both themselves and the wider realm.

event_feed_strings.text: The man who practices the Tao shows himself to be virtuous; the empire that practices the Tao shows virtue is the universe. \n\n ou must let your virtue become a model for others, that they may aspire to better both themselves and the wider realm.

text.last_approved_text: The Great Peace can only be achieved when chaos is purged, and harmony reigns over earth and heaven. The land and the people must be healed, and you must heal them. \n\n Sometimes, however, the surgeon's blade must be used in lieu of healing hands...

event_feed_strings.text: The Great Peace can only be achieved when chaos is purged, and harmony reigns over earth and heaven. The land and the people must be healed, and you must heal them. \n\n Sometimes, however, the surgeon's blade must be used in lieu of healing hands...

text.last_approved_text: "Just as heaven and earth return to peace, so should we." \n\n The words of the Tao must be ever in your mind now, as the emperor chosen by heaven itself - peace must reign and China be healed, but first the old ways must finally, truly die.

event_feed_strings.text: "Just as heaven and earth return to peace, so should we." \n\n The words of the Tao must be ever in your mind now, as the emperor chosen by heaven itself - peace must reign and China be healed, but first the old ways must finally, truly die.

text.last_approved_text: Your achievements have marked you out as one to watch, but the Sima clan is vast - you will need to progress further if you are to prove yourself a worth contender for the regency.\n\nOf course, if you have little time for such titles and 'legitimacy', you could always seek to put yourself on the throne by force...

event_feed_strings.text: Your achievements have marked you out as one to watch, but the Sima clan is vast - you will need to progress further if you are to prove yourself a worth contender for the regency.\n\nOf course, if you have little time for such titles and 'legitimacy', you could always seek to put yourself on the throne by force...

text.last_approved_text: You are among the most prominent of the princes - none could doubt that you would make a fine regent. You could seek to claim the title by force and march your armies into the imperial capital - or you could prove yourself a worthy and dependable friend of the Jin, and perhaps find the role offered to you willingly.

event_feed_strings.text: You are among the most prominent of the princes - none could doubt that you would make a fine regent. You could seek to claim the title by force and march your armies into the imperial capital - or you could prove yourself a worthy and dependable friend of the Jin, and perhaps find the role offered to you willingly.

text.last_approved_text: Ultimate power is within sight - whether it be as a shepherd of the emperor or as emperor in your own right. Push onwards and secure a fresh foundation for the Jin!

event_feed_strings.text: Ultimate power is within sight - whether it be as a shepherd of the emperor or as emperor in your own right. Push onwards and secure a fresh foundation for the Jin!

text.last_approved_text: You have proved yourself the mightiest of the Sima, and a worthy heir to the heritage of Sima Yi. China kneels before you, and you are victorious.\n\nBut perhaps it is not enough - if you were to eliminate the seven other major princes, then an even more total victory could be yours.

event_feed_strings.text: You have proved yourself the mightiest of the Sima, and a worthy heir to the heritage of Sima Yi. China kneels before you, and you are victorious.\n\nBut perhaps it is not enough - if you were to eliminate the seven other major princes, then an even more total victory could be yours.
